css_value: body.maxi-blocks--active #container-maxi-71407473-u{min-width:100%;box-shadow:0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(var(--maxi-dark-color-8,9,60,88),1);padding-top:150px;padding-bottom:150px;flex-direction:column;row-gap:20px;}body.maxi-blocks--active #container-maxi-71407473-u > .maxi-background-displayer .maxi-background-displayer__1{width:100%;height:100%;background-color:rgba(var(--maxi-dark-color-1,0,0,0),1);display:block;}body.maxi-blocks--active #container-maxi-71407473-u > .maxi-background-displayer .maxi-background-displayer__2{width:500px;top:50px;left:-200px;display:block;filter:blur(70px);}body.maxi-blocks--active #container-maxi-71407473-u > .maxi-background-displayer .maxi-background-displayer__2 svg *{fill:rgba(var(--maxi-dark-color-4,255,74,23),0.13);}@media only screen and (min-width:1921px){body.maxi-blocks--active #container-maxi-71407473-u{padding-top:200px;padding-bottom:200px;}body.maxi-blocks--active #container-maxi-71407473-u > .maxi-background-displayer .maxi-background-displayer__2{width:600px;left:-250px;}}@media only screen and (max-width:1024px){body.maxi-blocks--active #container-maxi-71407473-u > .maxi-background-displayer .maxi-background-displayer__2{width:400px;left:-150px;}}@media only screen and (max-width:767px){body.maxi-blocks--active #container-maxi-71407473-u{padding-top:60px;padding-bottom:60px;}body.maxi-blocks--active #container-maxi-71407473-u > .maxi-background-displayer .maxi-background-displayer__2{width:300px;}}@media only screen and (max-width:480px){body.maxi-blocks--active #container-maxi-71407473-u{padding-top:40px;padding-bottom:40px;}}
